member.name: M:NWConfigScriptor.ConfigScriptorForm.showConfigScript(System.String)
member.summary: display config scripts in check list box clear previous selection called by cmbxCmdScriptList_SelectedIndexChanged switch based method
member.param: created in "cmbxCmdScriptList_SelectedIndexChanged" method from user click event and passed in to search for
member.return: read all lines to a list box from a text file passed in if found, file not exist message if not found.
